thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 34 of 2268
thread.title: Delyth JONES

author: Delyth JONES
title: Delyth JONES
text:
I find the website the best one to use and that is why I went back to it time and again when we moved house and needed several windows dressed. The ease of viewing products by colour is great and the picture sizes are large making them easy to view and to see how the product would look in situ. The price is really good for the quality products that you get. Easy to use and quiet roller mechanisms on the blinds, great finishings on blinds and curtains.
With the massive choice of blinds and curtains there really is something to suit every style and taste.
I will definately use again and recommend to all. Also a relatively fast delivery and an easy to order process.
